components.html:
Before filling in the rest of the application, contact the company to check:

- if they can do the transcript by the time you need it
- how much they charge

Company | Contact details
----|----
Auscript | [www.auscript.com/en-GB/contact/](https://www.auscript.com/en-GB/contact/)
Epiq | [www.epiqglobal.com/en-gb/contact](https://www.epiqglobal.com/en-gb/contact)
Marten Walsh Cherer | [www.martenwalshcherer.com/contact-us/](https://www.martenwalshcherer.com/contact-us/)
Opus 2 | [www.opus2.com/contact](https://www.opus2.com/contact.html)
The Transcription Agency | [www.thetranscriptionagency.com](https://www.thetranscriptionagency.com/)
Ubiquis | [www.ubiqus.co.uk/about-us/contact-us](https://www.ubiqus.co.uk/about-us/contact-us/)


You can pay more for them to do the work more quickly. The choices are:

- overnight (within 24 hours)
- within 48 hours
- within 7 working days
- within 3 working days
- within 12 working days
The time begins when the company starts the work - not when you submit your application.

required.inline: Choose a company to do the transcript
required.summary: Choose a company to do the transcript
